name: Extract URLs' hyperlinks
description: Fetches HTML from URLs, parses it, and extracts hyperlinks. (Converted from Langflow Store for AxieStudio compatibility)

list_of_urls.name: list_of_urls
list_of_urls.info: List of retrieved URLs from a search engine to extract hyperlinks

code.value:
import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from typing import List, Dict

from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, Output

class HyperlinksExtractor(Component):
    display_name = "Extract URLs' hyperlinks"
    description = "Fetches HTML from URLs, parses it, and extracts hyperlinks."
    icon = "file-code"

    inputs = [
        DataInput(
            name="list_of_urls",
            display_name="Search results with URLs",
            info="List of retrieved URLs from a search engine to extract hyperlinks",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Search Results + Hyperlinks", name="search_results_with_hyperlinks", method="extract_hyperlinks_full")
    ]

    def extract_hyperlinks_full(self) -> List[Data]:
        list_of_urls: List[Data] = self.list_of_urls
        full_data = []
        
        for result in list_of_urls:
            url = result.link
            new_item = result.data.copy()

            # Extract HTML from the response
            response = requests.get(url)
            html_content = response.text

            # Parse the HTML
            soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
            
            # Extract the links from the given URL
            links = [link.get('href') for link in soup.find_all('a') if link.get('href')]
            
            new_item["hyperlinks"] = links
            full_data.append(Data(data=new_item))
            
        return full_data
code.name: code

import requests
from bs4 import BeautifulSoup
from typing import List, Dict

from axiestudio.schema import Data
from axiestudio.custom import Component
from axiestudio.io import DataInput, Output

class HyperlinksExtractor(Component):
    display_name = "Extract URLs' hyperlinks"
    description = "Fetches HTML from URLs, parses it, and extracts hyperlinks."
    icon = "file-code"

    inputs = [
        DataInput(
            name="list_of_urls",
            display_name="Search results with URLs",
            info="List of retrieved URLs from a search engine to extract hyperlinks",
        ),
    ]

    outputs = [
        Output(display_name="Search Results + Hyperlinks", name="search_results_with_hyperlinks", method="extract_hyperlinks_full")
    ]

    def extract_hyperlinks_full(self) -> List[Data]:
        list_of_urls: List[Data] = self.list_of_urls
        full_data = []
        
        for result in list_of_urls:
            url = result.link
            new_item = result.data.copy()

            # Extract HTML from the response
            response = requests.get(url)
            html_content = response.text

            # Parse the HTML
            soup = BeautifulSoup(html_content, 'html.parser')
            
            # Extract the links from the given URL
            links = [link.get('href') for link in soup.find_all('a') if link.get('href')]
            
            new_item["hyperlinks"] = links
            full_data.append(Data(data=new_item))
            
        return full_data
